cellularAutomata.error
Class WarningManager

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.error.WarningManager

public class WarningManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class limits the number of warnings that are displayed by rules or any other class. This is necessary because some classes are instantiated multiple times and might try to throw the same warning many times. For example, each rule can be instantiated multiple times (once per cell) and this class helps ensure that the warnings are not unnecessarily repeated.

All warnings are suppressed while the application opens (during the start-up procedure).

Author:
David Bahr

Method Detail

showWarning

public static boolean showWarning(java.lang.String warningMessage,
                                  int numberOfTimes)
If the specified warning has been displayed fewer than the specified number of times, then this indicates that the given warning should be displayed. When counting the number of times that a warning has been displayed, this method only knows about displayed warnings that have been queried through this method or one of the displayWarning methods. Each query to this method (and the displayWarning methods) increments the number of times that the warning has been displayed.

All warnings are suppressed while the application opens (during the start-up procedure).

Parameters:
warningMessage - The warning that will be displayed.
numberOfTimes - The number of times that the warning will be displayed.
Returns:
true if the warning should be displayed.

displayWarningWithConfirmDialog

public static int displayWarningWithConfirmDialog(java.lang.String warningMessage,
                                                  int numberOfTimes,
                                                  java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                                  java.lang.String title,
                                                  int yesNoCancelOrOtherResponseOption,
                                                  int messageType,
                                                  javax.swing.Icon icon)
Displays a confirmation dialog only if the specified warning has not already appeared the specified number of times. When counting the number of times that a warning has been displayed, this method only knows about displayed warnings that have been queried through this method, the show warning method, or one of the other displayWarning methods.

Parameters:
warningMessage - The warning that will be displayed.
numberOfTimes - The number of times that the warning will be displayed.
parentComponent - Parent of the displayed JOptionPane. May be null.
title - Title of the JOptionPane.
yesNoCancelOrOtherResponseOption - The type of response options, for example JOptionPane.YES_NO_CANCEL_OPTION.
messageType - The type of display message, for example JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE.
icon - An icon to be displayed in the JOptionPane. May be null.
Returns:
returns the response to the confirmation dialog (for example, JOptionPane.YES_OPTION); or -1 if the warning is not displayed and has never been displayed; or returns the previous response if the warning is not displayed, but the user has responded to this warning in the past.

displayWarningWithMessageDialog

public static boolean displayWarningWithMessageDialog(java.lang.String warningMessage,
                                                      int numberOfTimes,
                                                      java.lang.String title)
Displays a confirmation dialog only if the specified warning has not already appeared the specified number of times. When counting the number of times that a warning has been displayed, this method only knows about displayed warnings that have been queried through this method, the show warning method, or one of the other displayWarning methods.

This method assigns the CAFrame as a parent component to the the warning message. The message will be a warning message.

Parameters:
warningMessage - The warning that will be displayed.
numberOfTimes - The number of times that the warning will be displayed.
title - Title of the JOptionPane.
Returns:
true if the warning is displayed, and false otherwise.

displayWarningWithMessageDialog

public static boolean displayWarningWithMessageDialog(java.lang.String warningMessage,
                                                      int numberOfTimes,
                                                      java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                                      java.lang.String title,
                                                      int messageType,
                                                      javax.swing.Icon icon)
Displays a message dialog only if the specified warning has not already appeared the specified number of times. When counting the number of times that a warning has been displayed, this method only knows about displayed warnings that have been queried through this method, the show warning method, or one of the other displayWarning methods.

Parameters:
warningMessage - The warning that will be displayed.
numberOfTimes - The number of times that the warning will be displayed.
parentComponent - Parent of the displayed JOptionPane. May be null.
title - Title of the JOptionPane.
messageType - The type of display message, for example JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE.
icon - An icon to be displayed in the JOptionPane. May be null.
Returns:
true if the warning is displayed, and false otherwise.
